lead_paragraph: As news about a football player boycott at Minnesota broke, Northern Illinois athletic director Sean Frazier quickly realized his Huskies might have a chance to play in the Holiday Bowl.

headline.print_headline: Only on AP: As Minn. Waffled, NIU Prepped for Holiday Bowl
headline.main: Only on AP: As Minn. Waffled, NIU Prepped for Holiday Bowl
